item.description:
I am setting up a Mastermind group for my Meetup people. Mastergroup give a place to get to know each other share ideas and support each other. This requires people who want to built relationships with others to assist each others in growth. This is explaination of a Mastermind Group is from The book The power of Focus:

The primary purpose for the group is to establish support for each other emotionally, Personally and professionally. I also provides a unique forum for sharing ideas and information, as well as discussing meaningful topics and everyday challenges. (Canfield, Hansen, Hewitt 2000)
item.name: Mastermind Group
